/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high angle, providing a bird's eye view of the scene. The street, which is the main focus of the image, is lined with lush green trees and shrubs, adding a touch of nature to the urban setting. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the street, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate network against the backdrop of the clear blue sky. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
